verbose_text: The results revealed that luciferase expression was significantly suppressed in the groups transfected with the miR-135a and miR-135b mimics compared with the miR-NC group, while mutations of the miR-135a and miR-135b binding sites abrogated the suppression of luciferase expression (XREF_FIG), which suggests that miR-135a and miR-135b directly bind to the 3'UTR of GSK3beta.
